sourceMeaningMnemonic: Under this <radical>roof</radical> someone <radical>odd</radical> is trying to <kanji>approach</kanji> you. You back up, but they continue their approach anyway.
meaningInfo: Imagine being under the same roof as an odd person who wants to approach you. You don't want anything to do with them, but they won't back off.
readingMnemonic: They <kanji>approach</kanji> too closely and you can't take it anymore. You run out from under the roof, slam the door closed, and lock it with a <reading>key</reading> (<ja>き</ja>).
readingInfo: You hold the key tightly in your hand and press your ear to the roof. You can still hear the odd person... thing(?) approaching. Hopefully this key keeps it away.
